# Introduction {.unnumbered}

Uncertainty has been a very important issue in economic theory, especially since it is considered a different concept of risk knight15, because agents are always exposed to scenarios of uncertainty (\ cite {greenspan04} ). Therefore, it is necessary to measure market uncertainty to analyze the effects of its changes in economic activity.
